2.7.2: New Feature: Added 'MIS Reports' tab to download multiple reports into a single multi-sheet Excel file.
New Feature: The MIS Reports tab now automatically solves the mathematical CAPTCHA.
New Feature: Added a new 'Social Audit Report' automation for the SA View/Respond page.
Enhancement: PDF exports for the Social Audit Report now have a dynamic title.
Enhancement: Added a pop-up alert to notify users when automation tasks are complete.
Enhancement: The MIS Reports tab now remembers the last used State, District, and Block.
Fix: Major improvements to web automation stability for handling page reloads and complex dynamic tables.
Fix: Resolved a crash during PDF export caused by special characters (e.g., Hindi text).
Fix: Fixed various bugs in the new report automations, including input persistence and navigation logic.
